overview: Umro Ayyar - A New Beginning  (Pronounced as Ammar Ayaar, Urdu: عمرو عیار) is an upcoming Pakistani movie directed by Azfar Jafari , under the production of VR Chili Production. The film stars Usman Mukhtar, Sanam Saeed, Adnan Siddiqui & Faran Tahir. The story revolves around the new beginning of Umru Ayyar, who was an 80's-90's hero character from the very famous story Talism Hoshruba & Dastaan-e-Amir Hamza. The movie is expected to be released in 2022.
tagline: Legend became a Myth, Myth became a Story and After Hundreds of Years, the Legend Awakens Again.
title: Umro Ayyar - A New Beginning
